items.sentence: It\'s essential that you understand the situation.
Tom is living in a small apartment on Park Street.
Tom is still financially dependent on his parents.
Tom is wearing the black coat he bought last week.
I\'m surprised that Tom didn\'t enjoy the concert.
There\'s something I\'d like to talk to you about.
This car is my father\'s, but it\'ll soon be mine.
Have you ever served as a witness in a court case?
He cleared his throat before starting the lecture.
He failed in his attempt to swim across the river.
